title: This community is really shallow
body:
A player mad because I ask them to stop getting caught out then they flame everyone, and another player being toxic because I wouldnt give them my role. Tells me im bad while he has a 50% win rate a billion games and is the same elo as last season aka super stuck.

Vayne gets hooked after over chasing into a thresh wall. "nunu you r%%%%% you are losing us the game" "report nunu" rofl I feel like alot of reports/bans are unjustified due to this nature. People can be toxic assholes to you but if you arent the favorite you cant say anything or you get screwed.

replies.body: Just stick to not responding unless it's a decent situation to respond to. If they're toxic they don't deserve your time. Communicate with pings and mute toxics.
